experience.title: Team leader
experience.content: Team leader helped me learn a lot of think such as: group management, solving the problems of the group, time management. division of work ...ect

experience.title: Volunteer
experience.content: Relay season is a social program to support exam candidates in universities, colleges and secondary vocational schools. I take part in this program in 2013-2014 and 2014-2015. It brings me a lot of fun.
